gobblin.converter.serde

Class HiveSerDeConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.converter.Converter<SI,SO,DI,DO>
      • gobblin.instrumented.converter.InstrumentedConverter<Object,Object,Writable,Writable>
        • gobblin.converter.serde.HiveSerDeConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Instrumentable, RecordStreamProcessor<Object,Object,Writable,Writable>, FinalState, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class HiveSerDeConverter
extends InstrumentedConverter<Object,Object,Writable,Writable>
    An InstrumentedConverter that takes a Writable record, uses a Hive SerDe to deserialize it, and uses another Hive SerDe to serialize it into a Writable record. The serializer and deserializer are specified using HiveSerDeWrapper.SERDE_SERIALIZER_TYPE and HiveSerDeWrapper.SERDE_DESERIALIZER_TYPE.

    Note this class has known issues when the serializer is set to AvroSerializer. Mainly due to the fact that the Avro Serializer caches returned objects, which are not immediately consumed by the AvroContainerOutputFormat.

    This class has been tested when the serializer has been set to OrcSerde and should work as expected assuming the proper configurations are set (refer to the Gobblin documentation for a full example).
